quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Dragon Mining Limited is an Australia-based company, which operates gold mines and processing facilities in Finland and Sweden. The Company operates gold mines and processing facilities in Finland and Sweden. In Finland, the Vammala Production Centre consists of a conventional 300,000 tons per annum crushing, milling and flotation plant, the Jokisivu Gold Mine, the Orivesi Gold Mine, the Kaapelinkulma Gold Mine and the Uunimaki Gold Project. Annual production from Finland is in the range of 21,000 to 30,000 ounces of gold in concentrate depending on the grade of ore and gold concentrate feed. The Jokisivu Gold Mine is located approximately eight kilometers southwest of the Huittinen town center, some 40 kilometers southwest of the Vammala Plant in southern Finland. In Sweden, the operation is known as the Svartliden Production Centre, consisting of a 300,000 tons per annum carbon-in-leach processing plant together with the Svartliden Gold Mine and the Faboliden Gold Mine.
